Description:
Our client is a young generation AI company that provides real-time intelligence to businesses.Responsibilities: -Implement and champion Agile methodologies, ensuring that product development processes are streamlined.
Develop and execute a product strategy that aligns with the organization’s mission.
Lead and inspire a team of product managers.
Define and prioritize the product roadmap using Agile principles, ensuring alignment with customer needs, market trends, and business goals.
Oversee the end-to-end Agile product development process, from concept to launch, while maintaining a strong focus on quality, scalability, and user experience.
Effectively communicate product vision, progress, and updates to internal stakeholders, executive leadership, and external partners.Requirements: -7+ years of exp in product leadership roles with good strong experience in agile methodologies.
Deep understanding of AI Technologies.
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field.Job Details
